LinkedTransactionID.description: Unique identifier for the linked transaction.

Status.description: Current status of the linked transaction.

SourceTransactionID.description: Identifier of the source transaction linked to this transaction.

SourceLineItemID.description: Identifier of the line item in the source transaction.

SourceTransactionTypeCode.description: Type code of the source transaction.

ContactID.description: Identifier of the contact linked to this transaction.

TargetTransactionID.description: Identifier of the target transaction linked to this transaction.

TargetLineItemID.description: Identifier of the line item in the target transaction.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Date and time when the transaction was last updated in UTC.
